project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design and implement a multiple-choice quiz game in Python that asks the user questions, keeps track of the score, and displays the score at the end of the game. Questions and answers are hardcoded in the program.

task.name: Implement the structure of the quiz game, including loops and score tracking.
Create a list of multiple-choice questions and their respective answers.
Display each question to the user and collect their responses.
Calculate and display the final score at the end of the game.
Write tests for the quiz game functionality (e.g., scoring, question display).
Execute tests on the quiz game to ensure that all features work correctly.
